column4: how do i find out what is using my ports? ie port 25 if i dont want to run a mailserver, how can i stop the service, and remove the program? ie postfix or for port 631 ipp how do i stop and remove cups?
or by default is port 25 and 631 open?
you can disable services in breezy, i wouldnt remove cups/postfix etc....
you can get into dependency trouble if you remove that stuff i think
